body_html: @yuefengz I see. Another question is about the simple_estimator_example.py. Does this MirroredStrategy case will do gradients reduction in training process？This model_fn does not include any cross tower ops and the estimator.py only serves for the loss reduction not for the gradients. So if I want to do sync training, should I add cross tower ops in model_fn?

body: @yuefengz I see. Another  question is about the simple_estimator_example.py. Does this `MirroredStrategy` case will do gradients reduction in training process？This `model_fn` does not include any cross  tower ops and the `estimator.py` only serves for the loss reduction not for the gradients. So if I want to do sync training, should I add cross tower ops in `model_fn`?
